abstract: Estimates from both the White House and the Congressional Budget Office got worse, but the White House numbers are still a little bit rosier than the nonpartisan C.B.O.’s.
snippet: Estimates from both the White House and the Congressional Budget Office got worse, but the White House numbers are still a little bit rosier than the nonpartisan C.B.O.’s.

headline.main: Federal Budget Numbers Get Worse, Thanks to More Severe Downturn
